transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hi sir, myself Meenakshi from IndiaMART. Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello sir, Meenakshi bol rahi thi IndiaMART se sir, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Main theek hoon.
Executive: Sir, very good evening. Maine call aapko isliye kiya tha, kyunki aapka ek feedback aaya tha. Meri team se aaj aapko Vivek Arya ne connect kiya tha over the call.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, toh sir aapne usme not satisfied ka jab aapko call karte hain.
Customer: Haan madam.
Executive: Usko sahi tarike se executive ne address kiya ki nahi kiya manager ne aapke. Toh sir usme aapne not satisfied ka feedback diya hai. Maine aapko isiliye connect kiya hai sir ki aap bataiye kya dikkat aayi, kya aapko answer nahi kar paaya Vivek.
Customer: [unintelligible] hamara jo problem hai, woh solve nahi ho raha hai. Woh bol rahe hain hamara dusra product lo jo yeh woh isme isliye nahi ho raha toh dusra product kaike liye lenge hum. Isme lead nahi aa rahi humko toh.
Executive: Achcha. Achcha, aap jo current service mein run kar rahe ho, usme aapko business nahi mil raha hai. Aur Vivek ne aapko suggest kiya ki aap upgrade plan mein karne ke liye ki usme aapko lead milegi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Yes. Toh sir dekhiye, aapka jo current plan hai. Dekhiye sir, hum customer ke according hi customer se baat karte hain. Theek hai? Hum toh aapko batayenge sir. Lekin haan, woh galat hai ki aapka jo hai ki aapki jo leads ka tha, woh aapko pehle aapki jo problem thi, woh usko solve karna tha. Baad mein aapse yeh discuss karta ki sir aap yeh package mein dekh sakte hain. Right? Woh main agree kar rahi hoon. Main Vivek ko yeh cheez clear karungi ki woh aapse is type ke discussions mein na kare woh. Main yeh cheez clear karungi. Aage aapse is tarike se kare. Theek hai? Ab secondly hum log buyleads mein discuss karte hain. Aapko basically buyleads mein inquiry mein calls mein kya dikkat aa rahi hai? Kahan pe matlab convert nahi ho rahi hai ki relevant nahi aa rahi hai? Kya dikkat ho rahi hai sir?
Customer: Lead hi generate nahi ho rahi madam.
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Lead generate nahi ho rahi bola.
Executive: Generate nahi hoti hai?
Customer: Generate hi nahi hoti hai.
Executive: Aisa nahi hai sir ki mere platform mein leads nahi hai. Aapke platform mere platform pe leads hai. Aapko hyper local chahiye, all over India chahiye, kahan ka chahiye aap yeh bataiye.
Customer: Maharashtra and city aur Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar.
Executive: Toh sir aapko wahan pe filter option toh pata hoga na ki agar maan lijiye agar aapko Maharashtra ka chahiye toh aap Maharashtra ka filter laga sakte ho. Agar aapko West Bengal chahiye toh aap West Bengal ki laga sakte ho.
Customer: Woh lagaye na madam, woh lagaye na filter.
Executive: Toh sir abhi aap mujhe bataiye ki phir kya filter laga ke aap dekhiye, mere paas agar Maharashtra ki leads hogi toh hum aapko introduce karenge. Kyunki sir aapko bhi pata hai ki meri jo buyer ki requirement hoti hai, woh supplier ko introduce karna hi hoga. Agar main buyer ki requirement fulfill nahi karaungi toh woh buyer dobara mere platform pe nahi aayega. Toh hum logon ki top priority hi hoti hai ki buyer ki lead ko convert karana. Theek hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Business mile aur buyer ko bhi. Right? Toh sir agar aapka preferred locations hai, usme ek baar aapke product ke descriptions mein add karti hoon ki aapko Maharashtra ke leads chahiye. Theek hai? From local. Yeh main add karwa deti hoon aapka zyada se zyada. Jitna zyada main aapka add karwa dungi utna hi zyada aapko help milega isme. Theek hai?
Customer: Chalega chalega.
Executive: Theek hai? Aapka na aap zyada dekhiye sir aap ek location se chahiye. Toh aapko wahan pe na cheeze zyada search karni padegi. Aap jitna zyada cheeze search karoge na, utna hi pata chalega aapko.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai? Meri system na AI pattern pe kaam karti hai sir. Jitna zyada aap Maharashtra ke leads ko select karoge, search karoge toh pata chal gaya ki bhai inko Maharashtra ki chahiye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aapko West Bengal ka chahiye, aapko is category ke is order value ka chahiye toh woh sab kuch waise hi pata chalega.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai? Jitna zyada aap search karoge utna hi zyada aapke relevancy hume pata chalegi. Aapko jo city nahi chahiye aap usko not relevant mark kar sakte ho. Theek hai? Jo location nahi chahiye aap usko not mark kar sakte ho. Aap apne isko aap NI mark kar sakte ho. Toh uss tarah ki leads aana aapko dikhna 100% band ho jayega.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai? Aap aap abhi system ke samne hai toh aap bataiye main aapko guide kar deti hoon.
Customer: Kya karne ka madam abhi?
Executive: Abhi aap desktop pe hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hai na? Desktop pe aap settings mein jaaiye.
(silence)
Executive: Aap settings mein jaaiye.
(silence)
Executive: Settings mein aap gaye?
Customer: Haan madam.
Executive: Haan. Settings mein aapko ab dekhiye last option aa raha hoga buylead preference.
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Buylead preference.
(silence)
Executive: Dikha?
Customer: Buylead?
Executive: Buylead preference karke option aata hai.
(silence)
Executive: Settings mein aap mobile app se ho ya desktop se ho?
Customer: Desktop pe hoon madam.
Executive: Haan, toh desktop mein aapko left side mein settings ka option aata hai.
Customer: Haan na, setting mein gaya hoon mein. Abhi kisme jaane ka woh bolo na aap.
Executive: Upar dekhiye account setting, PNS setting, buylead preference aa toh raha hai sir. Fourth option.
Customer: Haan, buylead preference kya hai? Haan.
Executive: Haan. Ab usme aap click karoge toh aapko location preference aata hai aur aapko city preference aata hai. Location preference aur category preference aata hai aapko.
(silence)
Executive: Dikha?
Customer: Ek minute madam.
Executive: Hmm.
(silence)
Executive: Sabse upar aata hai location. Hmm, location aata hai phir category aati hai. Toh jo location aapko nahi chahiye na, woh location
Customer: Location toh clear filter Maharashtra hi daal diya wala hai.
Executive: Sir location mein jo nahi chahiye na, woh aap not relevant kar sakte ho. Main aapko woh bolna chah rahi hoon. Not preferred location aa raha hai uske neeche ek chota sa box aa raha hai.
(silence)
Executive: Dikha?
Customer: Relevant and recent kya hai?
Executive: Are sir woh toh buyleads mein aap pahunch gaye. Relevant aur recent pe aap location ka filter lagaoge. Yahan pe agar aapke paas Maharashtra ki koi lead hogi na, toh woh yahan se dikh jaati hai aapko.
Customer: [unintelligible] yahan pe toh kuch ja raha nahi hai wohi time. Haan. Main gaya abhi idhar gaya hai buylead preference. Preference mein jaane ke baad mere ko location preference. Your current location preference is local daalne wala hai.
Executive: Haan, haan.
Customer: Nantar prefer location, major city, other city and country.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Abhi kisme jao?
Executive: Ab aapko aapko agar aapko jaise local chahiye toh aap local ki city ka location filter laga rahe ho na?
Customer: Kidhar se lagane ka woh?
Executive: Sir upar dekhiye na icon bana hoga.
Executive: Upar dekhiye chota sa dikhta hoga. Aapko video call pe connect karu?
Customer: Haan madam. Nahi toh ispe connect karo na aap direct any desk pe.
Executive: Any desk nahi hota hai sir. Main video meeting ka calendar share karti hoon. Bas ek second rukiye.
(silence)
Executive: Sir dekhiye maine aapko bheja hai calendar. Aapke registered email ID pe gaya hai. Theek hai?
(silence)
Executive: Aapke registered email ID pe gaya hai sir.
(silence)
Executive: Aap join karo.
(silence)
Executive: Sir dekhiye aapka registered email ID jo hai na, a m k o n f c r o@gmail.com.
Customer: Haan wohi daal raha hoon madam, ek minute. Hmm.
(silence)
Executive: Dikha sir?
Customer: Ek minute open ho raha hai madam, mein ready. Hmm.
Executive: Meenakshi Rai ke naam se aaya hoga.
(silence)
Executive: Sir aaya?
(silence)
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ek minute madam, ek minute.
(silence)
Customer: Meenakshi Rai kya?
Executive: Haan Meenakshi Rai, yes sir.
(silence)
Executive: Sir join kiya aapne?
Executive: Hmm. Ho gaya.
Customer: [unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting enough buyleads. 

- Current plan is not providing business.

- Vivek suggested upgrading the plan.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the previous call experience.

- Agreed that the problem should have been solved first.

- Offered to add Maharashtra location to product description.

- Guided on how to set location preference.

- Sent a calendar invite for a video call.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to join the video call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location preference, video call, subscription
